---
date: "2024"
title: "Progress, Priorities, and Obstacles to Providing Adequate Shade and Lighting at Bus Stops in Los Angeles"
---

PI: Monisha Reginald, UCLA Luskin School of Public Affairs  

I performed data collection for a project examining the inequities of the rider experience at bus stops across Los Angeles, particularly for women and riders of color. I took measurements regarding street lighting and bus shelters, evaluating the potential for improvements.
